item.description: Hello. I'm planning on running 6 or 8 miles along the Charles this Sunday morning. (I may even be open to running 10 miles). I run at around a 9 1/2 minute per mile pace. I'm trying to get faster, but for now, that's where I am. I'm going to start training for a fall marathon soon, so I'm hoping to make these Sunday runs a fairly regular occurrence. At any rate, the start location will be Panera Bread on Arsenal Street in Watertown. Please feel free to come out and join me.
item.how_to_find_us: If it's warm, I'll be standing out front. If it's cold, I'll be waiting inside.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Sunday Morning Run Along the Charles
